name: TESCEN
description:
TESCEN is a technology company formed by a team of engineers, designers, scientists and professionals from different areas. Our Developments are made by a team of technology enthusiasts, inspired by creativity and innovation, and their prominent programming abilities.
 
We join creativity, coding skills, and technological tools to produce what hasn't been done.
 
We offer you our specialized services let us transform  weakness into added value.
